sources.title: Window Shopping (1938)
sources.description: Three mice run, cavort, sing and dance around in the stores and restaurants a big city at night. They wind up in a café for an early-morning snack and stocking up on food provisions before they return to the safety of their den beneath a man-hole cover in the street. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/window-shopping-1938/
